name: EXS-40 - Standard Package
description: Designed for smaller ordinance replication  and indoor use

name: EXS-60 - Standard Package
description: Self contained man portable unit with a low profile. Great for most ordinance replication and minimal field obstruction

name: EXS-80 - Standard Package
description: External tanks and taller chamber for larger ordinance replication

name: EXS-400 - Standard Package
description: MOAB (Mother of All Bombs) - Close Air Support (CAS) or large ordinance replication

name: SIM-SMK-6 Initiator (6 Smoke Capacity)
description: Six tube smoke ignitor with 6m wireless receiver

name: SIM-SMK-18 Initiator (18 Smoke Capacity)
description: Eighteen tube smoke ignitor with 6m wireless receiver

name: SIM-RPG - RPG Simulator
description: RPG-7 Shoulder Fire Simulator

name: SIM-RPG-6 Initiator (6 Shot Capacity)
description: Six tube smoke ignitor with 6m wireless receiver

name: SIM-RPG-18 Initiator (18 Shot Capacity)
description: Eighteen tube smoke ignitor with 6m wireless receiver

name: 18R2 Universal Wireless Remote
description: Wireless/Smart Firing System - Compatible with all our units, Script Firing Capable

name: 6M Wireless Receiver
description: 6 Cue Capable - Wireless Receiver for 18R2 Wireless Remote

name: 36M Wireless Receiver
description: 36 Cue Capable - Wireless Receiver for 18R2 Wireless Remote

name: Audio Box - Audible Immersion Sound System
description: Wireless Audio Receiver, Weatherized/Battery Powered Speaker - 400W Output w/ Stand & Cover.

name: Equipment Trailer
description: Custom OPCON trailer to move and stage equipment

name: PUCS - Earth Impact (Case = 6/Units)
description: Earth Impact Powder Containment Shells replicate ordinance impacts on natural ground

name: PUCS - Target Impact (Case = 6/Units)
description: Target Impact Powder Containment Shells used with our EXS sims for special round on target effects

name: PUCS - Night fire (Case = 6/Units)
description: Night fire Powder Containment Shells uses a flash powder to produce  vibrant effect on target.

name: PUCS - CBRN Attack (Case = 6/Units)
description: CBRN Attack PUCS uses a combination of yellow and flash powder to give a non standard round on target effect

name: PUCS - White Phosphorous (Case = 6/Units)
description: White Phosphorus PUCS utilize white powder and magnesium to replicate 'WILLY P'

name: PUCS - MOAB  - Earth Impact
description: Large Effect PUC for MOAB Unit - Earth Impact Powder Containment Shell

name: PUCS - MOAB  -  Target Impact
description: Large Effect PUC for MOAB Unit - Target Impact Powder Containment Shell

name: PUCS - MOAB  - Night Fire
description: Large Effect PUC for MOAB Unit - Night Fire Powder Containment Shell
